attributes.action: RE REPLOY 24/7 POLICE PRESENCE IN TIPTREE ESSEX...CUT BACKS CAUSE CRIME INCREASE
attributes.additional_details:
It is also the largest village in the world with over 12,000 residents but is a good 20 minutes car journey from the nearest police station and ZERO PERMANENT POLICE is unacceptable.

We want OUR police back , we want our friends, relatives and neighbours to feel safe. Please sign our petition and let's reverse the outrageous Government/Essex Police decision to cut this vital public service.
attributes.background: Having no 24/7 police presence our village as well as other parts of the county, is suffering a huge increase in petty crime, drug dealing and anti social behaviour.

rejection.details:
Policing in your local area is the responsibility of your local elected Police and Crime Commissioner. You can find out how to contact them here:

http://www.essex.pcc.police.uk/
